resources.string: Places of note in the surrounding Montgomery area.
2330 Cobbs Ford Service Rd, Millbrook, AL 36054
This is the best Mexican in the tri-county area.
This place is spooky. Many teens have entered. Few have returned!
Creepy on the outside, this house belongs to a nice old man that\'s happy to talk to visitors
Dirt road near, Cypress Ln, Millbrook, AL 36054
The film Big Fish erected a mock village. What\'s left is a spooky ghost town.
